1.q: How varied teaching experience does StarLight Academy has?
1.a: StarLight Academy believes in the imagination, confidence and flexibility of faculty. Considering this, the faculty members at the academy have 1 to 6 years teaching experience in their respective fields.

2.a: StarLight Academy conducts PTMs on first Sunday every month. The progress report of each student is shared with the parents and the student is counselled accordingly.

3.q: Do you give study materials and test papers?
3.a: Students are made to write notes for each subject and are also provided additional texts, ten year papers, assignments etc which are periodically assessed by the concerned faculty.

4.q: Do you take attendance of the students?
4.a: In each class, attendance is taken and if the student is absent, then immediately a message is sent to the studentâ€™s parents.

5.q: Do you provide extra classes to students?
5.a: Every Sunday, an extra class is provided to the students who are weak in the subject. This is to ensure that those students come at par with the others.

6.q: What about the safety of the students?
6.a: The director herself meets all the students personally and takes care of the students as well as the academy as a whole. She leaves the academy only when the parents of all the students pick them up.

7.q: How can we contact the director?
7.a: You may drop a mail on starlightacademy04@gmail.com. This mail is directly checked routinely by the director.
